column4: Please help, i'm trying to install ndiswrapper on 6.06 and I get the error:  Can't find kernel build files in /lib/modules/2.6.15-26-386/build; ----what should I do?
the 'build' subdirectory seems out of place, i.e. somehow the installation got it wrong. you did install from source, didn't you
which was the installation directory you specified?
